EmailTemplate.name: 2011_Imc_ProQA_MA-EMS-Mandate.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech/IMC Solutions and ProQA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Creating Excellence TriTech's Imc and ProQA
Together, TriTech Software System's Imc Solutions and ProQA make meeting the MA EMD mandate (scheduled for July 1, 2012) easy and affordable. [Read more about the EMD Mandate here]
PRIORITY DISPATCH - Calls are prioritized, triaged and dispatched quickly and safely. - Call reasons automatically initiate ProQA. - Call takers collect and send the right on-scene information for every call. - CAD location and calling party auto update into ProQA.
TRITECH IMC SOFTWARE - Structured protocols establish a unified multi-service standard. - Information gathered in ProQA is automatically saved in CAD. - A unified standard creates a measurable quality assurance process. - Mobiles receive up-to-date information for first responders.
Priority Dispatch software/training and Imc Interface costs may be covered through State’s Training, EMD and Support and Incentive Grants.
Contact us today at: - TriTech/Imc Solutions: David Bell | david.bell@tritech.com | 508.839.6445 x104 - Priority Dispatch: Adam Hinckley | adam.hinckley@prioritydispatch.net | 800-363-9127 x132
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
